text: how to delete your Netflix account.
How you cancel your Netflix account

depends on how you set up
your service to begin with.
But for this video, we'll show you
how to delete your Netflix account
using the Netflix site on desktop.

Open your web browser
and go to Netflix.com.

Click your profile icon
and click "Account."

You'll be taken to a page asking
you to confirm your choice

while providing details
of your cancellation.

You're given the option
to downgrade your plan,

and you are notified that
your settings will be saved

for 10 months if you decide
to restart your account.
the deletion of your Netflix account.
